lead_paragraph: Mr. Whalen, a partner in Robert M. Stern Architects, lives in a building with a distinguished pedigree.

headline.print_headline: A Place for a Crowd, or a Cozy Fireside Chat
headline.main: Paul L. Whalen, Architect, at Home in Greenwich Village

snippet: Mr. Whalen, a partner in Robert M. Stern Architects, lives in a building with a distinguished pedigree.
abstract: Architect and writer Paul L Whalen loves his two-bedroom apartment in West Village building designed by vaunted early 20th century developers Bing & Bing; pedigreed apartment is filled with contemporary art and favorite pieces of furniture, much of it purchased overseas.
